mew-support.title: MEW Support
mew-support.info: Any question? Get in touch and we’ll get back as soon as we can.

sotd.title: A Joint Effort With State of The DApps
sotd.info: By submitting your Dapp information, you acknowledge that your Dapp will be listed on {{url}}
sotd.name: State of the DApps

about-your-dapp.name: Dapp name
about-your-dapp.tags: A 5-7 word description of your DApp. Please don't include self-promotion or obvious words such as 'blockchain', 'decentralized', or 'Ethereum', (e.g. Game, Social, Finance...)
about-your-dapp.dapp-us: Is your Dapp available for use in the United States?
about-your-dapp.mock-user-flow: For live DApps, representative documentation of the current user flow. For dapps in development, a rough mockup of what prospective user flow as it might look on the MEW interface.
about-your-dapp.mock-requirements: Dimensions must be 1200px width by 630px height; JPEG or PDF file only; Image size no large than 5MB
about-your-dapp.contract-address: DApps without contract addresses will not be considered.
about-your-dapp.dapp-icon: Dimensions must be 192px width by 192px height (JPEG or PNG format)
about-your-dapp.icon-text: Drop your icon here, or select a file from your computer.
about-your-dapp.banner: Dimensions must be 1200px width by 206px height (JPEG or PNG format)
about-your-dapp.image-text: Drop your image here, or select a file from your computer.
about-your-dapp.contract-audit: Audits are not required for application, but are required by final step.

about-your-team.authors: Separate names or organizations with a comma
about-your-team.author-placeholder: e.g. James Lee, Emilie Roy, Edward McCormick
about-your-team.links-required: The company social links field is required

provide-text: Please provide all the required information we need.
congrats-msg: It takes about 3-5 business days to review your Dapp. And an email will be sent to you if the the status update.

dappsSubmission.successful: Great! Your DApp information have been successfully submitted.

dappsSubmission.try-again: We are sorry. There was an error and DApp submission failed. Please try again, if this error persists, contact support.
